document.full_text: german shoppers at the epicenter of an outbreak of a rare strain of e.coli bacteria are trying to avoid suspect foods without much certainty about the exact source of an illness that has claimed at least 17 lives.
document.title: germans take no chances as e.coli confounds experts
lines_and_colors: german shoppers at the epicenter of an outbreak of a rare strain of e.coli bacteria are trying to avoid suspect foods without much certainty about the exact source of an illness that has claimed at least 17 lives.
